summary: This module contains a comprehensive suite of unit tests that validate the mocked SageMaker pipeline functionality provided by the Moto library. The tests cover creating, deleting, describing, listing, and updating pipelines, as well as starting pipeline executions and handling related utilities such as ARN parsing and loading pipeline definitions from S3.
business_intent: Verify that the Moto mock implementation of the SageMaker pipeline API behaves correctly and matches the expected behavior of the real AWS service, ensuring reliable testing for applications that interact with SageMaker pipelines.
